Package com.cratediggers.dao

Class JpaDAO<E>

java.lang.Object
com.cratediggers.dao.JpaDAO<E>
Type Parameters:
E - type of entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlbumDAO, ArtistDAO, CustomerDAO, GenreDAO, OrderDAO, ReviewDAO, UserDAO
public class JpaDAO<E>
extends java.lang.Object
Superclass for other type-specific DAO classes. Implements all functionality of the entityManager that controls interaction with the database.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static javax.persistence.EntityManagerFactory entityManagerFactory
    Used to create EntityManager objects that interact with the database using HQL (Hibernate Query Language).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    JpaDAO()
    Constructs a new JpaDAO object.

      Used to create EntityManager objects that interact with the database using HQL (Hibernate Query Language).

  • Constructor Details

    • JpaDAO

      public JpaDAO()
      Constructs a new JpaDAO object.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public E create​(E entity)
      Creates a new record in database by persisting a provided entity object.
      Parameters:
      entity - the object to be stored in the database. The type of entity determines which table it is stored in.
      Returns:
      the created entity

    • update

      public E update​(E entity)
      Updates a record within the database by merging a provided entity object.
      Parameters:
      entity - the object to be updates in the database. The type of entity determines which table it is updates in.
      Returns:
      the updated entity

    • find

      public E find​(java.lang.Class<E> type, java.lang.Object id)
      Finds a specific record within the database and retrieves it as an entity object.
      Parameters:
      type - of the entity to be found. Determines which table should be searched.
      id - of entity to be found.
      Returns:
      the found entity object or null if not found

    • delete

      public void delete​(java.lang.Class<E> type, java.lang.Object id)
      Deletes a specific record within the database.
      Parameters:
      type - of entity to be deleted. Determines which table contains record to be deleted.
      id - of record to be deleted.

    • findWithNamedQuery

      public java.util.List<E> findWithNamedQuery​(java.lang.String queryName)
      Retrieves a list of a entity objects of a common type from the database according to a provided HQL query.
      Parameters:
      queryName - to be executed on database
      Returns:
      Results of the executed query

    • findWithNamedQuery

      public java.util.List<E> findWithNamedQuery​(java.lang.String queryName, int firstResult, int maxResult)
      Retrieves a list of a entity objects of a common type from the database according to a provided HQL query. List size is limited by retrieving only a subset of the results.
      Parameters:
      queryName - to be executed on database
      firstResult - to be included in query results
      maxResult - to be included in query results
      Returns:
      Results of the executed query

    • findWithNamedQueryObjects

      public java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> findWithNamedQueryObjects​(java.lang.String queryName, int firstResult, int maxResult)
      Retrieves a list of a object arrays from the database according to a provided HQL query. List size is limited by retrieving only a subset of the results.
      Parameters:
      queryName - to be executed on database
      firstResult - to be included in query results
      maxResult - to be included in query results
      Returns:
      Results of the executed query

    • findWithNamedQuery

      public java.util.List<E> findWithNamedQuery​(java.lang.String queryName, java.lang.String paramName, java.lang.Object paramValue)
      Retrieves a list of a entity objects of a common type from the database according to a provided HQL query. Query takes parameters.
      Parameters:
      queryName - to be executed on database
      paramName - to identify placeholder within query
      paramValue - to insert parameter value into query
      Returns:
      Results of the executed query

    • findWithNamedQuery

      public java.util.List<E> findWithNamedQuery​(java.lang.String queryName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> parameters)
      Retrieves a list of a entity objects of a common type from the database according to a provided HQL query. Query takes parameters.
      Parameters:
      queryName - to be executed on database
      parameters - maps parameter names to parameter values. Parameter names used to identify placeholders within query. Parameter values to insert parameter values into query.
      Returns:
      Results of the executed query

    • countWithNamedQuery

      public long countWithNamedQuery​(java.lang.String queryName)
      Retrieves the quantity of something stored within the database according to a provided HQL query.
      Parameters:
      queryName - to be executed on database
      Returns:
      Quantity within the database

    • countWithNamedQuery

      public long countWithNamedQuery​(java.lang.String queryName, java.lang.String paramName, java.lang.Object paramValue)
      Retrieves the quantity of something stored within the database according to a provided HQL query. Query takes parameters.
      Parameters:
      queryName - to be executed on database
      paramName - to identify placeholder within query
      paramValue - to insert parameter value into query
      Returns:
      Quantity within the database

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes entityManagerFactory for garbage collection.

    • greaterThanString

      public boolean greaterThanString​(java.lang.String str1, java.lang.String str2)
      Determines if the first of two strings occur first alphabetically. Useful for sorting algorithms.
      Parameters:
      str1 - first string for comparison
      str2 - second string for comparison
      Returns:
      true if the first string occurs first alphabetically, false if not
